sentences.english: Equipment nameplates will be bilingual, English and French.
sentences.chinese: 設備標示牌要採用英法雙語表示。

sentences.english: I'm studying at Qihang bilingual school, in Class 2, Grade 4.
sentences.chinese: 我住在仙河鎮，我在啓航雙語學校四年級二班上學。

sentences.english: All textbooks are compiled in English-Chinese edition to facilitate foreign learners.
sentences.chinese: 教材爲雙語版本，以國外學員角度編寫。

sentences.english: Many linguists suggest that the future facing us is bilingual or even trilingual.
sentences.chinese: 很多語言學家提出，我們在未來將使用雙語甚至三語。

sentences.english: In the fourth part, the thesis summarizes the outcome of practice research oninstructional design of bilingual physics teaching.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是中學物理雙語教學設計的實踐研究。

sentences.english: Most of the time, however, being fluently bilingual is not enough.
sentences.chinese: 然而，大多數時候，擁有流利的雙語能力還是不夠。

sentences.english: One day she saw his bi-lingual name cards and howled with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 一天，她看到了他的雙語名片，哈哈大笑。

sentences.english: But the bilinguals, their driving didn’t drop as much.
sentences.chinese: 但是雙語者水平下降的很少。

sentences.english: Kazhuo people of Mongolian nationality in Yunnan Province are all bilingual people.
sentences.chinese: 雲南蒙古族喀卓人是一個全民雙語的羣體。

sentences.english: The application of the two - name system is necessary in the bilingualism society.
sentences.chinese: 而雙名制則是雙語民族社會交際的客觀需要。

sentences.english: This article mainly investigates such peculiar bilingual teaching mode and its personnel training mode.
sentences.chinese: 重點對數理藏漢雙語教育教學模式進行了探討。

sentences.english: It is elocnted in both Chinese and Engilsh.
sentences.chinese: 這是用中英文雙語朗誦的。

sentences.english: Applicants whose personal statements are submitted in both Korean and English receive precedent.
sentences.chinese: 曾有申請學生遞交過韓英雙語之自薦個人陳述的先例。

sentences.english: Bitext is text from mutually translated text that is aligned into related segments.
sentences.chinese: 雙語文本來自對齊到相關片段的相互翻譯文本。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on extracting translation pairs from unaligned Chinese English bilingual corpora.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究基於未對齊的漢英雙語庫翻譯對抽取。

sentences.english: Learning Chinese Bracketing Knowledge Based on a Bilingual Language Model.
sentences.chinese: 基於雙語模型的漢語句法分析知識自動獲取。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
